ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault Construction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to be able to build various 'vault' shelter walls and doors, many of which are very strong and fireproof.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ruined Vault Construction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Expands on the vault construction, allowing colonists to build ruined (rusty and aged) variants of the vault structures. Is a seperate research project mostly for the purpose of ruined structures not cluttering the player's build tabs if they only want the non-ruined ones.
